plot: The film goes beyond the traditional facade of sport's battle for medals and explores the ethical dimensions of the efforts of the trainer and her modern and rhythmic gymnastics competitors...
title: Za Neshka Robeva i neynite momicheta
plot_es: The film goes beyond the traditional facade of sport's battle for medals and explores the ethical dimensions of the efforts of the trainer and her modern and rhythmic gymnastics competitors...
original_name: Za Neshka Robeva i neynite momicheta
